description: Previews the agents installed on the EC2 instances that are part of the specified assessment target.

parameters.name: previewAgentsArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the assessment target whose agents you want to preview.

nested_items.name: hostname
nested_items.description: The hostname of the EC2 instance on which the Amazon Inspector Agent is installed.

nested_items.name: agentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the EC2 instance where the agent is installed.

nested_items.name: autoScalingGroup
nested_items.description: The Auto Scaling group for the EC2 instance where the agent is installed.

nested_items.name: agentHealth
nested_items.description: The health status of the Amazon Inspector Agent.

nested_items.name: agentVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the Amazon Inspector Agent.

nested_items.name: operatingSystem
nested_items.description: The operating system running on the EC2 instance on which the Amazon Inspector Agent is installed.

nested_items.name: kernelVersion
nested_items.description: The kernel version of the operating system running on the EC2 instance on which the Amazon Inspector Agent is installed.

nested_items.name: ipv4Address
nested_items.description: The IP address of the EC2 instance on which the Amazon Inspector Agent is installed.
